text: In Unity, what does the acronym 'FPS' commonly stand for? Select one answer.
feedbackCorrect: In the context of Unity and game development, 'FPS' commonly stands for Frames Per Second, a measurement of how quickly a game or application can render images on screen.
feedbackIncorrect: In the context of Unity and game development, 'FPS' commonly stands for Frames Per Second, a measurement of how quickly a game or application can render images on screen.
